[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 43 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 10/21/1987]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 43 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 10/21/1987]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm2.National March on Washington for Lesbian and Gay Rights3.Brent Nicholson Earle, The American Run to End AIDS4.Harvey Milk memorial, Never Forget5.Let Freedom Ring, Benefit concert produced by the Lesbian and Gay Bands of America and speech by MA. Representative, Hon. Gerry Studds at the D.A.R. Constitution HallCOMMERCIAL:The Islanders Club6.The Wedding, interview with a couples getting married at the March on WashingtonCOMMERCIAL:The Monster7.Footage and interviews from The Names Project presentation at the March on Washington8.Footage and interviews from the March on Washington9.March on Washington Rally featuring Rev. Jesse JacksonCOMMERCIAL:Gay Treasures10.Continuation of March on Washington Rally featuring Rev. Jesse Jackson
